text.title: 2D Game Engine (SFML / Box2D / ECS)
text.shortDescription: Custom 2D engine with physics and entity-component-system.
paragraphs: A 2D side-view game/engine built with SFML for rendering, Box2D for physics, and a custom ECS for gameplay logic.
bullets: Designer tool for tiles / world editing.

text.title: Store Software Tooling
text.shortDescription: Tools for deploying and rolling back store software.
paragraphs: Internal tooling around deployment and rollback for store software, including a Qt-based version selector and SQL migration helpers.
bullets: Rollback scripts mixing files and SQL dumps.
Designed to be usable by non-technical staff.

text.title: Personal Services Stack
text.shortDescription: Self-hosted services behind Traefik and SSO.
paragraphs: My personal homelab setup with Docker, Traefik, Authentik, and various self-hosted services.
bullets: Services routed via labels and middlewares.
